about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered if you would make a good interrogator? Now you can find out. 12 lovingly hand crafted Case Files are on your desk and waiting to be opened.

With unprecedented freedom and player choice for the dialogue system, the game revolves around asking the right questions in the right order to get a confession from your Suspect.

Play Good Cop/Bad Cop to manage Rapport and Pressure.

Confront Suspects with Evidence while their lie is still up on screen for maximum Pressure.

Use your wits and your emotional intelligence to make the right decisions. Often there is more than one right answer.
